text: aya waya hambanthotata noase (2) (947)

ranil wikramasinha mahatha dan parlimenthu manthriwarayek bawin ohu araliya gaha mandirayen iwathwiya yuthu bawa janatha wimukthi peramune nayaka anura kumara disanayaka mahatha pawasiya.
emagin parlimenthu manthriwarunta karunu padanamwu wiwadayak parlimenthuwedi pawathwimata hakiyawa labenu atha.

siyalla sudanam wu wita, sathiyak pamana sampurnayenma wiyalimata ida di obe uduna aalokamath karanna.

yantham sathi kipayakata perathuwa ewaka japana agamathi yukiyo hathoyama ta thanathura athahara yamata bala kerune, okinawe amarikanu yuda kandawura pilibandawa saha japana-china samipa sabandatha gana adahas dakwima magin obama paripalanaya samaga gatumakata yama nisaya.
kese ho mema gamana ma ya yuthuya yana dadi hangimak ma sithe palapadiyam wuye mema gamana gana aaranchiya kana wakunu mohothedimaya.

uththara waradi nam asamath karanawa.

danna tharamin me ofis eka shep..üòä ada idan tika dawasak yanakam mage pawula meyala.goda dawasakata wennath puluwan ..üòâ awida ganna ba hariyata, wadi wela inna ba eka digata, thel beheth anga purama gagena gawumak adala rabar sereppu dapu mawa sari adina adi usa sapaththu dapu oyala madde hari amuthuwata penunath oyalage udaw nisa jiwithe lassana kara ganna puluwan kiyala hithenawa man thiranaya kale wenama deyak.eeth anthima mohothe athireka kridakaya karanna puluwan kiyapu nisa man mage thiranaya wenas kara..

tuk tuk wala drayiwar mahaththuruntath darshanika adahas thiyenawa.ee udawiya thama roda thunak padinne mokada kiyala samahara welawata hithenawa.parlimenthuwe mahaththuru mechchara moda thirana ganne parlimenthuwa wathura uda thiyena hinda wenna athi kiyala tuk tuk mahaththayek dawasak kiyanawa.ee mokada kiyala ahuwama,mi harak mada wathure bahala giniyama niwaganna wage ee mahaththurunge molath wathure idala pegila wenta athi kiyala eya kiyanawa.ee kathandara deke galapimak nathi wunata ee kiyapu kathaweth mokak hari amuthu gathiyak thiyenawa.

yahapath aarthika thaththwayak nothibiyedi thawa thawath daruwan hadima ho niyamitha wayas pramanayangen yuktha nowana daru padipelak bihi wime prathipalaya wanne gabsawen athwana prathipalayata wenas wunu khedaniya thaththwayak uda wimayi.

eeniya prajathanthrawadi kramaweda hethuwen rate aithihasika jathiyata thibiya yuthu eheth ahimi karanu labu eheth sulu janawarga wisin waraprasadayak karagena bhukthi windina ‚Äúrajun thanime‚Äù balaya rate aithihasika jathiya wu sinhala bauddhayanta himi wemin pawathina mohothaka, bedi wen wi athi sinhala bauddhayan eksath wime wibhawaya nirmanaya wi athi mohothaka apa siyalu dena katayuthu kala yuthu wanne ithamath tharkikawa wicharashiliwa, buddhimathwayi. 2009 di kuriru thrasthawadaya awasan wuwada ehi deshapalana peramuna ha jathyanthara peramuna parajaya kirimata rajaya apohosath wuwa pamanak nowa balaya udesa, rata jathiya ha aagama pawa diya haki, ukas kala haki apagema lesa penena wijathika balawega samaga ekwa eya shakthimath kirimata ganu labu uthsahayan handuna noganimata tharam aprawesam durwala wi ee nisa sinhala bauddha rajya nawatha dinaganima wenuwen wu aragalayata apa nayakathwaya demin sitinawa. 2015 janadhipathiwaranaya pilibandawa bodu bala senawa siya sanwidhayakayan ha pradhana dayakayan samaga jathika washayenuth jathyanthara washayenuth gambauru lesa sakachcha kala.
